ygData.subject: Re: NBW
ygData.msgSnippet: The tiger stayed still until it could smell and hear where the wolf was in the grass.  It steadied itself, getting it s self ready. It looked and saw the grass

The tiger stayed still until it could smell and hear where the wolf 
was in the grass.  It steadied itself, getting it's self ready.

It looked and saw the grass moving and it pounced.  It's huge muscled 
body pushing it upward and out towards Lunarpine.  It's pounce aim 
was a little off and missed Lunarpine by a foot. Now it saw him.  
It's huge k-9 teeth protruding out. It's huge paws ready to tear into 
his prey and soon, his next meal.
